name: Danger Dungeon
description:
This is my first pygame project. There are a few minor bugs which I'll sort at some point, but the goal I set myself was to create something and make it available online before moving onto a bigger (higher quality) project.

This game was written in Python, using Pygame.

the dodgy music, graphics and sound effect all created by me too.

How to play:

Move the pig with the mouse

Fire with a mouse button (careful, the pig can only have 6 bullets on the screen at a time).

kill the skeletons, don't touch them or you will lose a wound. 

Lose all your wounds and it's game over.
